page.title: 15FAMILY LIFE continued
page.content: (seventeen acres pasture four acres marsh and woodland)is worked by GN as a dairy unit,two years has been spent building a herd of thirty cows and young stock mainly Jerseys , which will hopefully become a viable business. Moving from a highly populated society containing a cross section of nationalities and classes,people seemed to have a broader outlook on life and greater expectatians for themselves and thier children. I find this rural area extremly pleasent as an environment in which to live ,far less aggressive.But find many of the inhabitants insular in thier outlook and isolated from the rest of the world. My hopes for the future are for a more caring sharing socety, particulry in a worldwide context.
